name: Cyber Dragon Herz
effectText: This card's name becomes "Cyber Dragon" while on the field or in the GY. You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Cyber Dragon Herz" per turn, and only once that turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can make this card's Level become 5 until the end of this turn, also, you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except Machine monsters. If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 other "Cyber Dragon" from your Deck or GY to your hand.
